name: Timeship
description:
You are scientist who found an hourglass shaped, ancient space-shuttle. The shuttle however is entwined in the past. Your ancestors  couldn't survive 'the ship' and now haunt it. if you ask for their help you may gain their powers... It is your duty to escape this anomaly and finish what your ancestors couldn't.

Gameplay: gamemode swaps each level

  • Soccer (Hit ball into other goal)
  • Killzone (Kill all aliens)
  • DDR (Dance)
  • Red light Green light (Don't move when bar is red)
  • Boss fight (good luck)

Controls:

  • tab - back to menu
  • esc - end game
  • (cheats, no shame) enter - skip a level
  • shift - hook
  • wasd or arrow keys (or space for jump)
  • left mouse for shoot/kick

developer note: I had a lot planned for this game but didn't have time to implement it. I will continue this project!!! + i'm gonna voiceact ;)

follow my Instagram account for more updates n whatever >> @david_dee_offical
